variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 300% of ATK to a single target and dispels all of their buffs.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 350% of ATK to a single target and dispels all of their buffs.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 400% of ATK to a single target and dispels all of their buffs.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 450% of ATK to a single target and dispels all of their buffs.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 500% of ATK to a single target and dispels all of their buffs.

Reduces damage taken by 18% and increases Demonsbane Spear damage by 50%. Yui also enters Soulbreaker status. Soulbreaker: Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing damage equal to 195% of Yui's ATK.

Reduces damage taken by 21% and increases Demonsbane Spear damage by 50%. Yui also enters Soulbreaker status. Soulbreaker: Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing damage equal to 205% of Yui's ATK.

Reduces damage taken by 24% and increases Demonsbane Spear damage by 50%. Yui also enters Soulbreaker status. Soulbreaker: Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing damage equal to 215% of Yui's ATK.

Reduces damage taken by 27% and increases Demonsbane Spear damage by 50%. Yui also enters Soulbreaker status. Soulbreaker: Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing damage equal to 225% of Yui's ATK.

Reduces damage taken by 30% and increases Demonsbane Spear damage by 50%. Yui also enters Soulbreaker status. Soulbreaker: Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing damage equal to 235% of Yui's ATK.
Reduces Magic DMG taken by 10%. Also ignores the enemy's Physical DEF equal to 20% of Yui's ATK for 10s after using Demonsbane Spear.
Reduces Magic DMG taken by 20%. Also ignores the enemy's Physical DEF equal to 40% of Yui's ATK for 10s after using Demonsbane Spear.
